mil3.3.3:4.2: “bhante nāgasena, yaṃ panetaṃ brūsi ‘purimā koṭi na paññāyatī’ti, katamā ca sā purimā koṭī”ti?
mil3.3.3:4.3: “Yo kho, mahārāja, atīto addhā, esā purimā koṭī”ti.
mil3.3.3:4.4: “Bhante nāgasena, yaṃ panetaṃ brūsi ‘purimā koṭi na paññāyatī’ti, kiṃ pana, bhante, sabbāpi purimā koṭi na paññāyatī”ti?
mil3.3.3:4.7: “Ito pubbe, mahārāja, sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ avijjā nāhosīti esā purimā koṭi na paññāyati, yaṃ ahutvā sambhoti, hutvā paṭivigacchati, esā purimā koṭi paññāyatī”ti.
mil3.3.3:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, yaṃ ahutvā sambhoti, hutvā paṭivigacchati, nanu taṃ ubhato chinnaṃ atthaṃ gacchatī”ti?
mil3.3.3:5.2: “Yadi, mahārāja, ubhato chinnaṃ atthaṃ gacchati, ubhato chinnā sakkā vaḍḍhetun”ti?
mil3.3.3:5.4: “Nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ pucchāmi koṭito sakkā vaḍḍhetun”ti?
mil3.3.3:6.2: Thero tassa rukkhūpamaṃ akās, “khandhā ca kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa bījānī”ti.
